episodes.title: Black Widower
episodes.plot: Jax is freed from prison and makes revenge his top priority. Wendy leaves rehab early and discovers Juice is hiding from SAMCRO and laying low at her apartment.

episodes.title: Toil and Till
episodes.plot: Jax calls in the Nevada charter for help in dealing a huge blow to Henry Lin and his crew. Unser digs into Tara's murder.

episodes.title: Playing with Monsters
episodes.plot: Jax bring forth some alliances to further destroy Henry Lin and plot August Marks demise. Juice tries to reach out to Chibs, but learns his actions are beyond redemption.

episodes.title: Poor Little Lambs
episodes.plot: A past effort to help one ally leads to trouble with another.

episodes.title: Some Strange Eruption
episodes.plot: Jax looks to draw out the snitch that sold him out to Lin, leading to a confrontation at the port. Juice leaves town with Gemma and discovers her true intentions.

episodes.title: Smoke 'em If You Got 'em
episodes.plot: Jax takes advantage of shifting alliances to protect the MC and settle a score.

episodes.title: Greensleeves
episodes.plot: Samcro makes an unlikely partnership in order to undermine a powerful club enemy.

episodes.title: The Separation of Crows
episodes.plot: A traitor is suspected as SAMCRO searches for a missing member.

episodes.title: What a Piece of Work Is Man
episodes.plot: The club makes critical decisions to get a club member back. The club deals with heartache internally and conflict with the organization at large.

episodes.title: Faith and Despondency
episodes.plot: The Sons MC deal with heartache internally and conflict within the organization at large.

episodes.title: Suits of Woe
episodes.plot: As the whole of the Sons of Anarchy organization bears down on the outlaw motorcycle club's California-based Redwood Original chapter, President Jackson "Jax" Teller comes face to face with an extremely unpleasant reality.

episodes.title: Red Rose
episodes.plot: Gemma visits her father. Jax learns where she's at and goes after her. Unser gets in his way and suffers the consequences. Juice runs his last deal for the club. Wendy and Jackson get together.

episodes.title: Papa's Goods
episodes.plot: SAMCRO president Jax Teller takes the final steps towards fulfilling his father's legacy.
